ValerianArquilla.Description: Aquila is the messenger of the god Zeus in mythology. Imperial scientists have developed this unique symbol of imperial power together with the Umojan Experiment Center. Storm Eagle "Aquila" is able to harness the power of thunder, dealing terrifying damage to nearby enemies and act with Zeus. **Can attack ground and air units**
ValerianArquilla.Name: Storm Eagle

ValerianScienceFacility.Description: Science Facility co-established by Terran Dominion and Umojan Protectorate. It is used to develop advanced Terran military technology and provide tech support for dominion forces.
ValerianScienceFacility.Name: United Dominion Science Facility

ValerianZeus.Description:
Odin is a heavy Siege Strider. It has the power to destroy a whole city.

Can attack the ground and air.
ValerianZeus.Name: Zeus

ValerianStarportTechReactor.Description: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
ValerianStarportTechReactor.Name: Umojan Tech Reactor

ValerianFactoryTechReactor.Description: Enables additional unit construction options and allows 2 units to be created simultaneously.
ValerianFactoryTechReactor.Name: Umojan Tech Reactor

ValerianTechReactor.Description: Unlocks advanced units and allows attached structure to train two units simultaneously.
ValerianTechReactor.Name: Umojan Tech Reactor

ValerianFusionCore.Description:
Provide upgrades for Terran Battlecarrier.

Enable:
- Terran Battlecarrier
ValerianFusionCore.Name: Umojan Fusion Core

ValerianArmory.Description:
Provide upgrades for Korhal Fortress.

Enable:
- Korhal Fortress
ValerianArmory.Name: Umojan Armory

ValerianStarportFlying.Description: Starport can build units after landed.
ValerianStarportFlying.Name: Dominion Starport

ValerianStarport.Description:
Dominion air unit production facilities.

Enables:
- Emancipator
- Heaven Eye
ValerianStarport.Name: Dominion Starport

ValerianLiberatorMotor.Description: Valerian's royal guard. These liberators become the emerging defense force of the royal family. **Can attack ground and air units**
ValerianLiberatorMotor.Name: Emancipator

ValerianRaven.Description:
Reformed ravens. Can provide multiple support abilities.

Can attack ground and air units.
Detector unit
ValerianRaven.Name: Heaven Eye

ValerianRavenTurret.Description:
Automated defense turret. Destroy in 20 seconds after deployed.

Can attack the ground and air.
ValerianRavenTurret.Name: Auto Turret

ValerianRavenDrone.Description:
Uses a laser to shoot down enemy missiles.
Cannot target projectiles fired by special skills.
Times out after 20 seconds.

Each shot cost 10 energy.
ValerianRavenDrone.Name: Point Defense Drone

ValerianBattlecruiserMotor.Description:
Through the meticulous cooperation between Umojan Tech and Diminion scientists, Terran Battlecarrier debuted as the Dominion's new generation of battlecruisers. Battlecarriers can easily take control of the front line from multiple tactical directions.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianBattlecruiserMotor.Name: Terran Battlecarrier

ValerianFactoryFlying.Description: Factory needs to land to produce units.
ValerianFactoryFlying.Name: Dominion Factory

ValerianFactory.Description:
Dominion vehicle production facility.

Enable:
- Acadia Squadron
- Sentinel
- Aurora
- Kraken Prototype
ValerianFactory.Name: Dominion Factory

ValerianHound.Description:
Valerian's royal guard, named after the werewolf kingdom of Greek mythology. Arcadia Squadron can be rapidly deployed to the battlefield.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianHound.Name: Arcadia Squadron

ValerianAuroraMotor.Description:
The heavy Cyclone "Aurora" was once considered a failure due to its slow deployment speed, but when the Imperial Ordnance Department received the actual product assembled by the talented Umoja mechanic, they realized how terrifying firepower it has.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianAuroraMotor.Name: Aurora

ValerianAuroraSiege.Description:
The heavy Cyclone "Aurora" was once considered a failure due to its slow deployment speed, but when the Imperial Ordnance Department received the actual product assembled by the talented Umoja mechanic, they realized how terrifying firepower it has.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianAuroraSiege.Name: Aurora

ValerianThorMotor.Description: Heavily prepared Thor mechs, formerly known as Black Hammer of the Imperial Elite Royal Guard. Known as Korhal Fortresses, they can absorb massive damage and provide powerful support for Valerian's units. **Can attack ground and air units**
ValerianThorMotor.Name: Korhal Fortress

ValerianThorSiege.Description: Heavily prepared Thor mechs, formerly known as Black Hammer of the Imperial Elite Royal Guard. Known as Korhal Fortresses, they can absorb massive damage and provide powerful support for Valerian's units. **Can attack ground and air units**
ValerianThorSiege.Name: Korhal Fortress

ValerianCrackenMotor.Description: A giant and slow biomechanical unit. The remaining drawings of the Cerberus Project were handed to Umoja scientists, and they developed to repilcate this military unit. **Can attack ground units**
ValerianCrackenMotor.Name: Kraken Prototype

ValerianCrackenSiege.Description: A giant and slow biomechanical unit. The remaining drawings of the Cerberus Project were handed to Umoja scientists, and they developed to repilcate this military unit. **Can attack ground units**
ValerianCrackenSiege.Name: Kraken Prototype

ValerianMineMotor.Description:
Large intelligent robot from Umojan Tech, a war defense expansion model of the Widow Mine, acts as a defense drone in various important military facilities.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianMineMotor.Name: Sentinel

ValerianMineSiege.Description:
Large intelligent robot from Umojan Tech, a war defense expansion model of the Widow Mine, acts as a defense drone in various important military facilities.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianMineSiege.Name: Sentinel

ValerianSupplyDepotLowered.Description:
Provide supply for terran forces.
Increase the unit number limit.
Lower the supply depot, allowing ground units to cross it.
ValerianSupplyDepotLowered.Name: Supply Depot

ValerianSupplyDepot.Description:
Provide supply for terran forces through airdrop.
Increase the unit number limit.
Lower the supply depot, allowing ground units to cross it.
ValerianSupplyDepot.Name: Supply Depot

ValerianAutomatedRefinery.Description: Improved refinery. Can deliver refined vespene gas directly to the command center via a short-distance warp field. Free the SCVs from the vespene gas production process.
ValerianAutomatedRefinery.Name: Automated Refinery

ValerianSatellite.Description: After Valerian Mengsk succeeded his father, Umojan Protectorate began to offer critical tech support for the reformed Terran Dominion. "Korhal Satellite", this small orbital platform is now core to the operation of Terran Dominion.
ValerianSatellite.Name: Korhal Satellite

ValerianPlanetaryFortress.Description:
Basic Structure, used to receive collected resources. Can attack nearby ground and air units. Cannot Lift off

Allow:
- Dominion Elite Engineer
ValerianPlanetaryFortress.Name: Dominion Planetary Fortress

ValerianSCV.Description:
Basic work unit. Used for resource collection, building dominion structure and repair.

Can attack the ground.
ValerianSCV.Name: Dominion Elite Engineer

ValerianLiberatorSiege.Description: Valerian's royal guard. These liberators become the emerging defense force of the royal family. **Can attack ground and air units**
ValerianLiberatorSiege.Name: Emancipator

ValerianBattlecruiserSiege.Description:
Through the meticulous cooperation between Umojan Tech and Diminion scientists, Terran Battlecarrier debuted as the Dominion's new generation of battlecruisers. Battlecarriers can easily take control of the front line from multiple tactical directions.

Can attack ground and air units.
ValerianBattlecruiserSiege.Name: Terran Battlecarrier
